|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2021.10; |stockos = Linux;5.15.0;Debian;

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "StarFive VisionFive 2 V1.3B" is silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[StarFive]] JH7110 -U74x4 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad-Core RISC-V (RV64GC) 64-bit *GPU: [[Imagination]] [https://www.imaginationtech.com/news/imagination-gpu-selected-by-starfive-for-next-generation-visionfive-2-single-board-computer/ BXE-4-32] @600MHz :(OpenGL ES3.2, OpenVG 1.2, Vulkan 1.2) :VPU: H.264/H.265 decoder up to 4Kp30, :H.265 encoder up to 1080p30 *Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash (''[[GigaDevice]]''), :TF card (max. 128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 8GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM (''Biwin'') *Network: 2x GbE ports (1x w/ PoE support) *PCIe: NGFF M.2 (M-key) socket w/ PCIe 2.0 *USB: 4x USB 3.1 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB (Type-C) supporting USB :PD 2.0 and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 or :5V Power from the GPIO Pin 2 and 4 or :via PoE via PoE expansion header
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.starfivetech.com/uploads/VisionFive%202%20isionDocumentation.pdf Documentation] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/risc-v-based-visionfive-2-launched-on-kickstarter/ ''RISC-V based VisionFive 2 launched'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/08/23/starfive-visionfive-2-quad-core-risc-v-sbc-linux/ ''StarFive VisionFive 2 quad-core RISC-V SBC launched'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/02/12/starfive-visionfive-2-sbc-review-debian-12/ ''StarFive VisionFive 2 RISC-V SBC using Debian 12'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/starfive-visionfive-2-single-board-pc-with-a-quad-core-risc-v-chip-coming-in-november/ ''StarFive VisionFive 2 single-board PC'' on '''liliputing'''] *[https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2023/risc-v-business-testing-starfives-visionfive-2-sbc ''RISC-V Business: Testing StarFive's VisionFive 2 SBC'' on '''Jeff Gerling''' Blog]
